item.title: events
item.description: future conferences 19th Conference of the International Federation of Classification Societies (July 14-16, 2026 - Milan, Italy) Data Science, Statistics & Visualisation 2026 (June 29 - July 01, 2026 - Trento, Italy) Joint Meeting SIS-FENStatS 2026 (June 22-25, 2026 - Rome, Italy) 5th ISI Regional Statistics Conference (June 03-05, 2026 - Valletta, Malta) recent events 65th ISI World Statistics Congress 2025 (October 05-09, 2025 - The Hague, The Netherlands) International Scientific Joint Meeting of the Italian and Dutch-Flemish Classification Societies (September 08-10, 2025 - Naples, Italy) Data Science, Statistics & Visualisation 2025 (July 07-09, 2025 - Kruger National Park, South Africa)

item.title: materials and info
item.description: I am a statistician and my research is focused on the methodological and computational aspects of data analysis. The best feeling is when I can use my knowledge to solve practical and real problems. I am currently working on latent variable models, unsupervised classification and model-based composite indicators. ongoing projects software seminars and talks events supervisions and teaching
